message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "We utilized data from the Food and Agriculture Organization's Global Information and Early Warning System on Food and Agriculture to examine food price trends in several African countries.", "dataset": ["Food and Agriculture Organization's Global Information and Early Warning System on Food and Agriculture"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food"]}, {"sentence": "This report analyzes survey data gathered by the World Bank's Enterprise Surveys team from businesses across several African countries.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Enterprise Surveys"], "topic": ["Competitiveness"]}, {"sentence": "To investigate the impact of debt relief on poverty alleviation, we used household data from the Living Standards Measurement Study-Integrated Surveys on Agriculture in several Latin American countries.", "dataset": ["Living Standards Measurement Study-Integrated Surveys on Agriculture"], "topic": ["Debt", "Poverty"]}, {"sentence": "We complemented our analysis of internet usage patterns in several Southeast Asian countries with a dataset on mobile phone ownership rates from the International Telecommunication Union.", "dataset": ["mobile phone ownership rates from the International Telecommunication Union"], "topic": ["Digital Development"]}, {"sentence": "We analyzed data from the United Nations Office for Disaster Risk Reduction on disaster losses in several Caribbean countries over the past decade.", "dataset": ["United Nations Office for Disaster Risk Reduction"], "topic": ["Disaster Risk Management"]}, {"sentence": "This study uses data from the Programme for the International Assessment of Adult Competencies to explore the relationship between education levels and labor market outcomes in several European countries.", "dataset": ["Programme for the International Assessment of Adult Competencies"], "topic": ["Education", "Jobs & Development"]}, {"sentence": "To assess renewable energy potential in several South Asian countries, we looked at geographical data on wind speeds and solar radiation from the National Aeronautics and Space Administration.", "dataset": ["geographical data on wind speeds and solar radiation from the National Aeronautics and Space Administration"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We analyzed data from the World Database on Protected Areas to explore the effectiveness of conservation efforts in several African countries.", "dataset": ["World Database on Protected Areas"], "topic": ["Environment"]}, {"sentence": "To examine the impact of mining activity on local communities, we used census data on population demographics from several Latin American countries.", "dataset": ["census data on population demographics"], "topic": ["Extractive Industries"]}, {"sentence": "This paper integrates two datasets - one on financial access levels for women and another on gender-based legal restrictions - to explore the relationship between financial inclusion and women's economic empowerment in several Middle Eastern countries.", "dataset": ["financial access levels for women", "gender-based legal restrictions"], "topic": ["Financial Inclusion", "Gender"]}]
